channel.title: fradeve on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in fradeve on open-archaeo

item.title: ark-addons
item.description: This is a Django project to obtain statistical information from an ARK project. It is aimed to mine data from archaeological databases and create customizable visualizations, querying both text and geographical data.

item.title: grass-arch
item.description: A LaTeX textbook devoted to explain how archaeologists can work with GRASS GIS

item.title: sipontomedievale
item.description: This repo contains the code for an interactive website created to illustrate historical background, findings and data of the Siponto excavation site (Manfredonia, Italy)
